commentsLeft.name: Drew from Arizona
commentsLeft.comment: I went to Arches National Park and it literally changed my life. The river that runs through Moab is awesome too! Check it out if you want to have a blast!

commentsLeft.name: Jake
commentsLeft.comment: We went to Grand Teton. It was so perfect. I proposed to my girlfriend at Jenny Lake.

commentsLeft.name: Andrew
commentsLeft.comment: I fell in the lake because I saw a bear.

commentsLeft.name: Enoch
commentsLeft.comment: I went to White Sands and it was hot!

commentsLeft.name: Drew
commentsLeft.comment: I went to arches on June 17

commentsLeft.name: Terry
commentsLeft.comment: I went to Arches and it was hot!
